ncrsdatagroup.abcd:ProjectTitle: Collecting trip to the Azores in 1979

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: AZO.016: Azores, Sao Miguel, S coast, E of Ponta Delgada, Ponta de Rosto do Cao; 37°44'N 25°38'W; rocky shore with tide pools and large basin; shore- and snork.; 23.ix.1979
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.022: Canary Islands, S of Lanzarote; 28°49'N 13°48'W; depth 37 m, fine shellgravel and calcareous algae; van Veen grab; 15.v.1980
CANCAP-VI, Sta. 6.002: Cape Verde Islands, SE of Sao Tiago; 14°39'N 23°21'W; deptm 3650-3840 m, deep-sea clay; 3.5 m Agassiz trawl; 4,5.vi.1982
Sta. MAU.013: Off Mauritania; 18°50'N 16°20'W; depth 20 m, coarse yellow sand with shell gravel; Van Veen grab; 8.vi.1988
CANCAP-III, Sta. 3.109: Mauritania, Baie du Lévrier; 20°49'N 17°01'W; depth 14 m, muddy sand with tube worms ; van Veen grab; 27.x.1978
Sta. MAU.108: Mauritania, off Banc d'Arguin; 20°31'N 17°04'W; depth 20 m, small catch, shell gravel; 2.4 m Agassiz trawl; 18.vi.1988
Sta. MAU.050: off Mauritania; 19°05'N 16°25'W; depth 20 m, shells, gorgonians,hermitcrabs, some red algae; 2.4 m Agassiz trawl; 11.vi.1988
CANCAP-III, Sta. 3.180: off Mauritania; 20°22'N 17°02'W; depth 14.5 m, many shells and calcareous algae; 1.2 m Agassiz trawl; 1.xi.1978
CANCAP-III, Sta. 3.112: off Mauritania; 20°20'N 17°15'W; depth 30 m, shell gravel (mainly Venus-shells); triangular dredge; 27.x.1978
KUHL & VAN HASSELT: Java and Indian Ocean
CANCAP-VI, Sta. 6.015: Cape Verde Islands, S of Sao Tiago; 14°53'N 23°30'W; depth about 150 m, coarse sand and shell gravel; ; 5.vi.1981
CANCAP-VII, Sta. 7.052: Cape Verde Islands, SW of Maio; 15°06'N 23°15'W; depth 594 m, practically no sediment; van Veen grab; 25.viii.1986
CANCAP-II, Sta. 2.085: Canary Islands, S of Fuerteventura, Punta de Jandia; 28°02'N 14°30'W; depth 500-700 m, clayey sand and shells; van Veen grab; 31.viii.1977
